name: NORUGGIES
description: NoRuggies ($NORUGGIES) is a meme-driven blockchain ecosystem built around a core mission of increasing transparency and protection for early-stage token launches. The project combines cultural elements of meme communities with an infrastructure layer designed to reduce the frequency and impact of rug pulls. Its primary product is a Solana-based launchpad integrated directly inside Telegram. This launchpad allows developers to create new tokens while locking collateral into an on-chain bundle before deployment. If malicious activity or a liquidity rug is detected, smart contracts automatically liquidate the collateral and distribute refunds to affected holders. NoRuggies aims to transform speculative environments into safer, more accountable spaces by creating a self-correcting economic system where transparency is built into the launch process. The ecosystem also includes staking rewards, NFT-based membership tiers, a reputation scoring system for developers, and a public “Wall of Rugs” ledger that documents failed or malicious launches.
